documents.name: Privacy Policy
documents.text:
Collection of Information from Site Visitors Use of Information Collected Disclosure of Information to Third Parties Right to Change Privacy Policy Privacy Policy February 6th, 2020 This privacy policy informs you of Vericast’s data practices on Vericast.com (“Site”).
This site may contain information about, and links to the websites of, other companies related to us or with whom we have a relationship.
Each company and website may be governed by its own privacy policy and terms of use.
For more information on the data practices of these companies, please refer to their specific privacy policies.
This privacy policy governs the use of this Site only.
Collection of Information from Site Visitors We may collect personal and nonpersonal information about you.
For example, we collect personal information directly from you when you choose to provide it, such as when you request information from us or otherwise contact us.
This information may include your name, address, email address and phone number.&nbsp.
We also might collect information about you indirectly.
For example, when you visit our Site certain information may be passively collected and stored including your Internet protocol address, unique personal identifier, online identifier/browser fingerprint, browser type, mobile services provider, type of device, operating system and applications installed on the device.
We may also use a standard technology called “cookies” and web server logs to collect information about how our website is used.
Information gathered through cookies and web server logs may include the date and time of visits, information you searched for and viewed, the pages visited, time spent at our website and the websites visited just before and just after our website.
This Site is not intended for persons under the age of 18 and we do not knowingly collect information from persons under the age of 18.
Use of Information Collected We may use information you provide to fulfill your requests for information on us or our products, programs and services.
to respond to your inquiries.
for marketing and promotion.
to provide services.
and to offer you other products, programs or services that we believe may be of interest to you.
We may use nonpersonal information for statistical analysis, fraud prevention, product development, content creation and site improvement.
Disclosure of Information to Third Parties We may share the information we collect with vendors, consultants and other service providers who carry out work or perform services on our behalf.
between and among Vericast partners and related companies.
any current or future parent, subsidiary, and/or affiliated company.
with your consent or at your direction.
as required to do so by law or in the good-faith belief that such action is necessary.
in connection with litigation or threatened litigation.
for fraud prevention and protection.
and/or in the event of a merger or sale.
We may also share aggregated information, which cannot reasonably be used to identify you, with third parties.
Visitors may opt out of having their personal information shared with third parties by contacting us at vericast.information@vericast.com, except in cases where such sharing is needed to operate our site, prevent fraud or respond to government or litigation inquries.
Right to Change Privacy Policy We reserve the right to change this policy at any time.
It is your responsibility to check the policy for any changes, so please review this page periodically.

documents.name: Terms of Use
documents.text:
Content Your Use of the Site Modifcations Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability Links to or Connections with Third Party Site or Applications Miscellaneous​ Terms of Use February 6th, 2020 Vericast is a marketing solutions company that accelerates profitable revenue growth for the 70,000 businesses it serves directly by influencing consumer transaction behavior at scale and engaging with over 120 million households daily.
These Terms of Use (“Terms”) govern your use of the Vericast site, located at Vericast.com (“Site”).
If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use the Site or any information contained herein.
By using the Site or the information contained herein you agree to these Terms.
Content All text, graphics, user interfaces, visual interfaces, photographs, trademarks, logos, sounds, music, artwork, computer code, downloadable content and other content and materials (collectively, “Content”), including, but not limited to, the design, structure, expression, “look and feel” and arrangement of such Content contained on the Site is owned, controlled or licensed by or to us, and may be protected by trade dress, copyright, patent and trademark laws, and various other intellectual property rights and unfair competition laws.
No part of the Site or Content may be copied, reproduced, republished, uploaded, posted, publicly displayed, encoded, translated, transmitted or distributed in any way without our express prior written consent.
We do not represent or endorse the accuracy or reliability of any advice, opinion, statement, or other information displayed or distributed through the Site, including any sites that may be linked to or from this Site.
You acknowledge that any reliance upon any opinion, advice, statement, memorandum, or information shall be at your sole risk.
We reserve the right, in our discretion, to correct any errors or omissions in the Content or on the Site.
All trademarks and service marks that may be used or featured on the Site to identify the products and services of other companies are the property of their respective owners.
Your Use of the Site You may not use any “deep-link”, “page-scrape”, “robot”, “spider” or other automatic device, program, algorithm or methodology, or any similar or equivalent process to access, acquire, copy or monitor any portion of the Site or Content, or in any way reproduce or circumvent the navigational structure or presentation of the Site or any Content.
You may not probe, scan or test the vulnerability of the Site or any website or network connected to the Site, nor breach the security or authentication measures on the Site or any network connected to the Site.
You agree not to use any device, software or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Site.
You may not pretend that you are, or that you represent, someone else, or impersonate any other individual or entity.
You may not use the Site or any Content for any purpose that is unlawful or prohibited by these Terms.
Modifications We may change these Terms at any time and such changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
You should check these Terms periodically because your continued use of the Site will be deemed acceptance of any modified terms and conditions.
If you do not agree to the modified terms and conditions, please discontinue use of the Site.
Disclaimers and Limitation of Liability WE PROVIDE THE SITE AND CONTENT “AS IS” AND “AS AVAILABLE” WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED.
WE (INCLUDING OUR AFFILIATES) DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, WHETHER EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, QUIET ENJOYMENT, QUALITY, ACCURACY, TITLE AND NON-INFRINGEMENT, AND ANY WARRANTY ARISING OUT OF COURSE OF DEALING, USAGE OR TRADE.
WITHOUT LIMITING THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING, WE (INCLUDING OUR AFFILIATES) DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED, THAT THE SITE AND CONTENT WILL BE ERROR-FREE OR THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED.
NO ADVICE OR INFORMATION, WHETHER ORAL OR WRITTEN, OBTAINED FROM THE SITE OR CONTENT, OR CONNECTED SITES, WILL CREATE ANY WARRANTY REGARDING US (OR OUR AFFILIATES) THAT IS NOT EXPRESSLY STATED IN THESE TERMS OF USE.
YOU USE THE SITE, AND USE, ACCESS, DOWNLOAD, OR OTHERWISE OBTAIN OUR CONTENT, AT YOUR OWN DISCRETION AND RISK.
Links to or Connections with Third Party Site or Applications Our Site, Content or communications to you may contain third party content or links to third party sites, applications or services (collectively, “Third Party Content”).
The Site, Content or our communications to you may also include features that allow you to connect with accounts or services provided by third parties (collectively, “Third Party Services”).
We are not responsible or liable for any Third Party Content or Third Party Services, including any damages, losses, failures, or problems caused by, related to, or arising from Third Party Content or Third Party Services.
Your interactions and business dealings with the providers of the Third Party Content or Third Party Services, including products or services offered by such third parties, are solely between you and the third party.
You should review all of the relevant terms and conditions associated with Third Party Content or Third Party Services, including any privacy policies and terms of service.
We are not responsible for any information that you agree to share with third parties in connection with Third Party Content or Third Party Services.
Miscellaneous You may not use the Site and may not accept these Terms if (a) you are not of legal age (at least 18 years old) to form a binding contract, or (b) you are a person barred from receiving the services under the laws of the United States or other countries including the country in which you are resident or from which you use the services.
We control and operate the Site from the United States and we make no representations or warranties that the information, products, or services provided through our services or our content are appropriate for accessor use in other jurisdictions.

points.title: Instead of asking directly, this Service will assume your consent merely from your usage.
points.quoteText:
We may change these Terms at any time and such changes will be effective immediately upon posting.
You should check these Terms periodically because your continued use of the Site will be deemed acceptance of any modified terms and conditions.
